cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid hex format '0xZZZ' will cause parsing errors and gNB initialization failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB block power to an excessively high value of 100 dBm will cause invalid configuration and transmission power issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 區塊功率設定為過高的 100 dBm 值會導致無效配置，並造成傳輸功率問題。
